root = self.getChild("root")

config.script:
root = self.parent.parent
	try:
		root.retireContactDb()
	except:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while deletition. Please try again.")	
		raise	
	
	root.clearInputs()
	
	payload={}
	payload['providerId'] = self.view.params.providerId
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType='mhByCondition',payload=payload,scope='page',
		sessionId=self.session.props.id,pageId=self.page.props.pageId)

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

customMethods.name: insertContactDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
INSERT INTO [organization].[ProviderContacts]
	           ([providerId]
	           ,[firstName]
	           ,[lastName]
	           ,[phone]
	           ,[email]
	           ,[notes]
	           ,[username]
	           ,[timeCreated]	
	                      
	           )
	     VALUES
	           (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
	"""

	emvRow1 = self.getChild("EmbeddedView_Row1")
	
	providerId = self.view.params.providerId
	
	firstName = emvRow1.props.params.firstName
	lastName = emvRow1.props.params.lastName
	phone = emvRow1.props.params.phone
	email = emvRow1.props.params.email
	notes = emvRow1.props.params.notes
	userName = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	timeCreated = system.date.now()
	
	args = [providerId, firstName, lastName, phone, email, notes, userName, timeCreated ]
	contactId = system.db.runPrepUpdate(query, args, 'RITIOps')
	
	return contactId

customMethods.name: updateContactDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
UPDATE [organization].[ProviderContacts]
SET 
	 [firstName] = ?
	,[lastName] = ?
	,[username] = ?
	,[phone] = ?
	,[email] = ?
	,[notes] = ?
 WHERE [id] = ?
	"""
	
	emvRow1 = self.getChild("EmbeddedView_Row1")
	firstName = emvRow1.props.params.firstName
	lastName = emvRow1.props.params.lastName
	userName = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	phone = emvRow1.props.params.phone
	email = emvRow1.props.params.email
	notes = emvRow1.props.params.notes
	
	contactId = self.view.params.contactId
	
	args = [firstName, lastName, userName, phone, email, notes, contactId]
	system.db.runPrepUpdate(query, args, 'RITIOps')
	
	return contactId

customMethods.name: setComponentsDb
customMethods.script:
emvRow1 = self.getChild("EmbeddedView_Row1")

	if isinstance(contactId, (int, long)) and contactId >= 0:
		
		query = """
		DECLARE 
			 @contact_id AS INT = ?
		
		SELECT
			 [id]
			,[providerId]
			,[firstName]
			,[lastName]
			,[username]
			,[phone]
			,[email]
			,[timeCreated]
			,[timeRetired]
			,[notes]
		FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[ProviderContacts]
		WHERE [id] =  @contact_id
	
		"""
		result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [contactId], 'RITIOps')

		emvRow1.props.params.firstName = result.getValueAt(0, 'firstName')
		emvRow1.props.params.lastName = result.getValueAt(0, 'lastName')
		emvRow1.props.params.phone = result.getValueAt(0, 'phone')
		emvRow1.props.params.email = result.getValueAt(0, 'email')
		emvRow1.props.params.notes = result.getValueAt(0, 'notes')
		self.view.custom.toUpdateDelete = True
	else:
		emvRow1.props.params.firstName = ''
		emvRow1.props.params.lastName = ''
		emvRow1.props.params.phone = ''
		emvRow1.props.params.email = ''
		emvRow1.props.params.notes = ''
		self.view.custom.toUpdateDelete = False

customMethods.name: retireContactDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
UPDATE [organization].[ProviderContacts]
   SET [timeRetired] = ?
 WHERE [id] = ?
"""

	timeRetired = system.date.now()
	contactId = self.view.params.contactId
	
	args = [timeRetired, contactId]
	
	system.db.runPrepUpdate(query, args, 'RITIOps')

customMethods.name: getValidationMessage
customMethods.script:
import re
	system.perspective.print(('aaa'))
	emvRow1 = self.getChild("EmbeddedView_Row1")
	
	_firstName = emvRow1.props.params.firstName
	
	system.perspective.print((_firstName, not(_firstName),str(_firstName).strip == ''))
	
	_lastName = emvRow1.props.params.lastName
	_phone = emvRow1.props.params.phone
	_email = emvRow1.props.params.email
	_notes = emvRow1.props.params.notes

	
	_patternPhone = re.compile("^[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{4}$", re.IGNORECASE)
	

	if not(_firstName):
		validationMsg = "First name is mandatory!"
	elif not(_lastName):
		validationMsg = "Last name is mandatory!"
	elif _phone and _patternPhone.match(_phone) is None:
		validationMsg = "Phone must be in the format ***-***-**** "	
	else:
		validationMsg = ''
		
	return validationMsg

customMethods.name: clearInputs
customMethods.script:
emvRow1 = self.getChild("EmbeddedView_Row1")
	emvRow1.props.params.firstName = ''
	emvRow1.props.params.lastName = ''
	emvRow1.props.params.phone = ''
	emvRow1.props.params.email = ''
	emvRow1.props.params.notes = ''
